Name: Copper Leaf
SeedDescription: Plant these in spring. Takes 10 days to mature.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plantalas en primavera. Toma 10 dias para madurar.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Pflanzen Sie diese im Frühjahr. Die Reifezeit beträgt 10 Tage.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.fr: Plantez-les au printemps. Prend 10 jours pour mûrir.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.it: Piantali in primavera. Ci vogliono 10 giorni per maturare.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ja: これらを春に植えます。 成熟するのに10日かかります。
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plante-as na primavera. Leva 10 dias para amadurecer.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ru: Высаживайте их весной. Вырастают за 10 дней.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.tr: Bunları ilkbaharda dikin. Olgunlaşması 10 gün sürer.
